jobsJson.text: Head of Analytics - Strategy and Special Projects
jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Head of Analytics - Strategy and Special Projects is responsible for the strategy, design, implementation, on how Gojek Group’s BI team deliver insights that drive impact. This role will support the Head of BI on the use of Business Intelligence strategies to drive innovation, commercial, and enterprise objectives across all of Gojek Group subsidiaries and countries. 

This role is based in Jakarta (Indonesia), requires travel, and will be responsible for the Business Intelligence teams under the Engineering function.
jobsJson.description:
Head of Analytics - Strategy and Special Projects is responsible for the strategy, design, implementation, on how Gojek Group’s BI team deliver insights that drive impact. This role will support the Head of BI on the use of Business Intelligence strategies to drive innovation, commercial, and enterprise objectives across all of Gojek Group subsidiaries and countries. 

This role is based in Jakarta (Indonesia), requires travel, and will be responsible for the Business Intelligence teams under the Engineering function.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
jobsJson.additional:

lists.content:
• Leading, growing and scaling the organization (now 140+ people) so that it continues to support the company's use of data in its decision making
  • Strategy-making & future-proofing the team’s technical and personal capabilities for becoming centre of excellence in analytics
  • Coordinating cross-functional collaboration: driving efficiency and efficacy across the BI organization
  • Own and develop relationships with senior executives from C-levels, Business, Product and TechGuide, lead, partner, collaborate with overall data org in driving the overall roadmap
  • Support execution of Gojek’s vision by collaborating with stakeholders to create business cases and prioritize project resourcing based on high impact to Gojek and its customers
  • Championing execution of the CDO vision by maintaining focus on activities to create long term value across Gojek’s data platform and applications while executing on short term objectives
  • Create a data value chain strategy and lead efforts to operationalize it within Gojek
  • Strive to identify new areas of value creation for the organization by adopting a holistic view of its data assets, people and processes
  • Champion a continuous improvement mindset within the organization. Enable effective scaling by identifying areas for standardization, automation and process optimization
  • Drive a data value chain mindset by partnering with different groups within Gojek to develop solutions for their data and analytics needs. Lead activities to progressively enabling the use of data analytics within their decision-making process
  • Enable trust by driving the adoption of a robust and transparent data governance process with a focus on explainable analytics. Focus on data security and data protection policy adoption
  • Create an environment conducive to agile high-performing teams and attract, retain and grow talent within the organization. Foster an inclusive and respectful culture within the team.

• 5+ years of experience working in data-focused fields, data management, data architecture, data model design, data governance, and developing the underlying technologies needed to enable data innovation across a large enterprise with startup speed
  • 5+ years of demonstrated management experience with strategic alignment, relationship management, and leading/ mentoring teams 
  • Demonstrable experience in the use of analytics to inform business decisions (in more than one industry)
  • Stakeholder management – senior to junior, prioritization, project management
  • Thrives under intense pressure
  • SQL is a must
  • Organizational and business strategy experience
  • Nice to have: Experience with engineering high volume streaming data pipelines
  • Nice to have: Strong programmatic analytics skills (R, Python, etc)
